remarks: Value of the functor category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fucco.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fucco.n $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
fucco.a $e |- A = ( Base ` C ) $.
fucco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` D ) $.

fucco.f $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F N G ) ) $.
fucco.g $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( G N H ) ) $.
fuccoval.f $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
fuccoval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ( <. F , G >. .xb H ) R ) ` X ) = ( ( S ` X ) ( <. ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) , ( ( 1st ` G ) ` X ) >. .x. ( ( 1st ` H ) ` X ) ) ( R ` X ) ) ) $.
